DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Filters
Time Period
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Capacity (blue), Contracted Time (red) & Weeks with not Enough Capacity","WidgetType":"rangeselector","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#e0e0e0","WidgetHeight":100,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"startDate":"2018/06/1","endDate":"2019/06/30","type":"year","visible":false},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  t.[Date] - datepart(dw, t.[Date]) + 1 as Week,
        sum(t.WorkingTime - t.Holidays - t.Leaves) as Capacity,
        sum(t.ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
        iif(sum(t.WorkingTime - t.Holidays - t.Leaves - t.ContractedTime) < 0, sum(t.WorkingTime - t.Holidays - t.Leaves), null) as NotEnoughCapacity
from    (
                select	
					--du.UserTypologyGroupId as TypologyGroupOid,
					--du.Oid as UserOid,
					du.[Date] as [Date],
					sum(du.RequiredHours) as WorkingTime,
					sum(du.HolidayTime) as Holidays,
					sum(du.LeaveTime) as Leaves,
					0 as ContractedTime
				from
					Analytics.DatamartUser du
				where
					datepart(dw, du.[Date]) not in (1,7)
					and Year(du.[Date]) = @year
				group by
					--du.UserTypologyGroupId, du.Oid, 
                    du.[Date]
                union all
                select  
					--t.TypolodyGroupOid,
                    --t.UserOid,
					t.[Date],
					0 as WorkingTime,
					0 as Holidays,
					0 as Leaves,
					sum(t.ContractedTime) as ContractedTime
                from    (
                            select 
								--de.UserTypologyGroupId as TypolodyGroupOid,
								--de.UserId as UserOid,
								de.[Date] as [Date],
								sum(de.[Hours] / (datediff(dd, de.[Date], de.Expiration) + 1)) as ContractedTime
							from 
								Analytics.DatamartEstimate de 
								left outer join EstimateItemDetail eid on eid.Oid = de.ItemId
							where
								eid.[Type] = 2 and
								Year(de.[Date]) = @year
							group by 
								--de.UserTypologyGroupId,
								--de.UserId,
								de.[Date]
                        ) t
                group by 
					--t.TypolodyGroupOid, 
					--t.UserOid, 
					t.[Date]
        ) t
where   
	Year(t.[Date]) = @year
group by 
	t.[Date] - datepart(dw, t.[Date]) + 1","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["year"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Typology Groups
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Staff, Proposals & Timesheet","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":300,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Delayed To Do","metricFieldValue":"DelayedToDoJobsGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"?  Delayed Work in Progress","metricFieldValue":"DelayedWorkInProgressJobsGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with HeadCount as (
	select 
			v.UserTypologyGroupId,
			v.UserTypologyGroup,
			v.WorkDays,
			count(v.UserName) as TypologyWorkDays,
			(count(v.UserName) * 1.0) / (v.WorkDays * 1.0) as HeadCount
	from (
		select	
				(DATEDIFF(dd, @FromDate, @ToDate) + 1)
				-(DATEDIFF(wk, @FromDate, @ToDate) * 2)
				-(CASE WHEN DATENAME(dw, @FromDate) = 'Sunday' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
				-(CASE WHEN DATENAME(dw, @ToDate) = 'Saturday' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
				as WorkDays,
				v.[User] as UserName,
				v.UserTypologyGroup, 
				v.UserTypologyGroupId,
				v.[Date]
		from	
				Analytics.Timesheet(@CurrentUserId) v
		where	
				v.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate
		group by
				v.[User], 
				v.UserTypologyGroup, 
				v.UserTypologyGroupId,
				v.[Date]
	) v
	group by 
			v.UserTypologyGroupId,
			v.UserTypologyGroup,
			v.WorkDays
), usertypes as (
	select distinct ut.[Name] as UserType, ut.Oid as UserTypeId, u.Oid from [User] u, UserType ut where u.UserType = ut.Oid
)
select 
		distinct t.TypologyGroup,
		di.[Name] as Division,
		de.[Name] as Department,
		t.TypologyGroupOid,
		IsNull(hd.HeadCount, 0.0) as HeadCount,
		t.Capacity,
		t.Holidays,
		t.Leaves,
		t.ContractedTime,
		t.PlannedTime,
		t.ForecastTime,
		t.ActualTime,
		t.BillableTime,
		t.NewBusinessTime,
		t.AdministrativeTime,
		t.ClientTime,
		t.ClientBillableTime,
		(t.BillableTime + t.PlannedTime) as BillableAndPlannedTime,
		(t.BillableTime + t.ForecastTime) as BillableAndForecastTime,
		IIF(t.Capacity > 0, (t.ClientTime / t.Capacity), 0) AS CapacityClientTimeVariation,
        IIF(t.Capacity > 0, (t.ContractedTime / t.Capacity), 0) AS CapacityContractedTimeVariation,
		IIF(t.Capacity > 0, ((t.BillableTime + t.PlannedTime) / t.Capacity), 0) CapacityBillableAndPlannedVariation,
		IIF(t.Capacity > 0, ((t.BillableTime + t.ForecastTime) / t.Capacity), 0) CapacityBillableAndForecastVariation,
		IIF(t.ContractedTime > 0, ((t.BillableTime + t.PlannedTime) / t.ContractedTime), 0) ContractedBillableAndPlannedVariation,
        IIF(t.ContractedTime > 0, ((t.BillableTime + t.ForecastTime) / t.ContractedTime), 0) ContractedBillableAndForecastVariation
		
from(
select 
		t.TypologyGroup,
		t.TypologyGroupOid,
		sum(t.Capacity) as Capacity,
		sum(t.Holidays) as Holidays,
		sum(t.Leaves) as Leaves,
		sum(t.ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
		sum(t.PlannedTime) as PlannedTime,
		sum(t.ForecastTime) as ForecastTime,
		sum(t.ActualTime) as ActualTime,
		sum(t.BillableTime) - sum(t.AdministrativeTime) as BillableTime,
		sum(t.NewBusinessTime) + sum(t.AdministrativeTime) as NewBusinessTime,
		sum(t.AdministrativeTime) as AdministrativeTime,
		sum(t.ClientTime) as ClientTime,
		sum(t.ClientBillableTime) as ClientBillableTime
from(
select 
		v.UserTypologyGroup as TypologyGroup,
		v.UserTypologyGroupId as TypologyGroupOid,
		sum(v.Capacity) as Capacity,
		sum(v.Holidays) as Holidays,
		sum(v.Leaves) as Leaves,
		sum(v.ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
		sum(v.PlannedTime) as PlannedTime,
		sum(v.ForecastTime) as ForecastTime,
		sum(v.ActualTime) as ActualTime,
		sum(v.BillableTime) as BillableTime,
		sum(v.NewBusinessTime) as NewBusinessTime,
		sum(v.AdministrativeTime) as AdministrativeTime,
		sum(v.BillableTime + v.NewBusinessTime) as ClientTime,
		sum(v.ClientBillableTime) as ClientBillableTime
from 
(
select 
		du.UserTypologyGroup,
		du.UserTypologyGroupId,
		du.Oid as UserId,
		sum(du.Capacity) as Capacity,
		sum(du.HolidayTime) as Holidays,
		sum(du.LeaveTime) as Leaves,
		0 as ContractedTime,
		0 as PlannedTime,
		0 as ForecastTime,
		sum(du.ActualTime) as ActualTime,
		sum(du.BillableTime) as BillableTime,
		sum(du.NewBusinessTime) as NewBusinessTime,
		sum(du.AdministrativeTime) as AdministrativeTime,
		0 as ClientTime,
		0 as ClientBillableTime
from 
		Analytics.[User](@CurrentUserId) du
where 
        (du.EndDate is null or du.EndDate > @ToDate) AND
		du.[Date] between @FromDate AND @ToDate and
        DATEPART(DW, du.[Date]) not in (1,7) and
		(du.CompanyId = @CompanyOid OR @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
group by 
		du.UserTypologyGroup,
		du.UserTypologyGroupId,
		du.Oid
union all
select 
		de.UserTypologyGroup,
		de.UserTypologyGroupId,
		de.UserId as UserId,
		0 as Capacity,
		0 as Holidays,
		0 as Leaves,
		sum(de.[Hours]) as ContractedTime,
		0 as PlannedTime,
		0 as ForecastTime,
		0 as ActualTime,
		0 as BillableTime,
		0 as NewBusinessTime,
		0 as AdministrativeTime,
		0 as ClientTime,
		0 as ClientBillableTime
from 
		Analytics.Estimate(@CurrentUserId) de left outer join EstimateItemDetail edt on de.ItemId = edt.Oid
where 
		edt.[Type] = 2 and
		de.[Date] between @FromDate AND @ToDate and
		(de.CompanyId = @CompanyOid OR @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
group by 
		de.UserTypologyGroup,
		de.UserTypologyGroupId,
		de.UserId
union all
select 
		pht.UserTypologyGroup,
		pht.UserTypologyGroupId,
		pht.UserId as UserId,
		0 as Capacity,
		0 as Holidays,
		0 as Leaves,
		0 as ContractedTime,
		sum(pht.[Hours])as PlannedTime,
		0 as ForecastTime,
		0 as ActualTime,
		0 as BillableTime,
		0 as NewBusinessTime,
		0 as AdministrativeTime,
		0 as ClientTime,
		0 as ClientBillableTime
from 
		Analytics.PlannedHoursTotal(@CurrentUserId) pht left outer join Project dp on pht.ProjectId = dp.Oid
where 
		dp.[EndDate] between @FromDate AND @ToDate and
		(pht.CompanyId = @CompanyOid OR @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
group by 
		pht.UserTypologyGroup,
		pht.UserTypologyGroupId,
		pht.UserId
union all
select 
		ph.UserTypologyGroup,
		ph.UserTypologyGroupId,
		ph.UserId as UserId,
		0 as Capacity,
		0 as Holidays,
		0 as Leaves,
		0 as ContractedTime,
		0 as PlannedTime,
		sum(ph.[Hours]) as ForecastTime,
		0 as ActualTime,
		0 as BillableTime,
		0 as NewBusinessTime,
		0 as AdministrativeTime,
		0 as ClientTime,
		0 as ClientBillableTime
from 
		Analytics.PlannedHours(@CurrentUserId) ph,
		Analytics.Project(@CurrentUserId) dp
where 
		ph.ProjectId = dp.Oid and
		dp.[Date] between @FromDate AND DATEADD(dd, -1, @ToDate) and
		(ph.CompanyId = @CompanyOid OR @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
group by 
		ph.UserTypologyGroup,
		ph.UserTypologyGroupId,
		ph.UserId
union all
select 
		dt.UserTypologyGroup,
		dt.UserTypologyGroupId,
		dt.UserId as UserId,
		0 as Capacity,
		0 as Holidays,
		0 as Leaves,
		0 as ContractedTime,
		0 as PlannedTime,
		0 as ForecastTime,
		0 as ActualTime,
		0 as BillableTime,
		0 as NewBusinessTime,
		0 as AdministrativeTime,
		0 as ClientTime,
		sum(dt.ActualTime) as ClientBillableTime
from 
		Analytics.Timesheet(@CurrentUserId) dt
where 
		dt.[Date] between @FromDate AND @ToDate and
		dt.Client is not null and
		(dt.CompanyId = @CompanyOid OR @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
group by 
		dt.UserTypologyGroup,
		dt.UserTypologyGroupId,
		dt.UserId
) v		
	left outer join usertypes du on du.Oid = v.UserId
where	(du.UserTypeId = @UserType or @UserType = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
group by
		v.UserId,
		v.UserTypologyGroup,
		v.UserTypologyGroupId 
) t
where t.TypologyGroupOid is not null
group by 
		t.TypologyGroup,
		t.TypologyGroupOid
) t 
    left outer join HeadCount hd on hd.UserTypologyGroupId = t.TypologyGroupOid
    left outer join UserTypology ut on ut.UserTypologyGroup = t.TypologyGroupOid
	left outer join Department de on de.Oid = ut.Department
	left outer join Division di on di.Oid = de.Division
where 
	(di.Oid = @DivisionOid OR @DivisionOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') AND 
	(de.Oid = @DepartmentOid OR @DepartmentOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
order by 
		t.TypologyGroup","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate","CompanyOid","DivisionOid","DepartmentOid","UserType"]}}]

Client","name":"BillableClient","alignment":"right","format":"#,##0"}],"sortByGroupSummaryInfo":[{"summaryItem":"count"}],"summary":{"calculateCustomSummary":"function (options) {            if (options.name === 'ContractedVsCapacitySummary') {                switch(options.summaryProcess) {                    case 'start':                        options.totalValue = [0,0];                        break;                    case 'calculate':                        options.totalValue[0] = options.totalValue[0] + options.value.ContractedTime;                        options.totalValue[1] = options.totalValue[1] + options.value.Capacity;                        break;                    case 'finalize':                        if(Number(options.totalValue[1]) > 0)                            options.totalValue = (options.totalValue[0] / options.totalValue[1]);                        else                            options.totalValue = 0;                            break;                }            }            if (options.name === 'BillableVsPlannedVsContractedSummary') {                switch(options.summaryProcess) {                    case 'start':                        options.totalValue = [0,0];                        break;                    case 'calculate':                        options.totalValue[0] = options.totalValue[0] + options.value.BillableAndPlannedTime;                        options.totalValue[1] = options.totalValue[1] + options.value.ContractedTime;                        break;                    case 'finalize':                        if(Number(options.totalValue[1]) > 0)                            options.totalValue = (options.totalValue[0] / options.totalValue[1]);                        else                            options.totalValue = 0;                            break;                }            }            if (options.name === 'BillableVsPlannedVsCapacitySummary') {                switch(options.summaryProcess) {                    case 'start':                        options.totalValue = [0,0];                        break;                    case 'calculate':                        options.totalValue[0] = options.totalValue[0] + options.value.BillableAndPlannedTime;                        options.totalValue[1] = options.totalValue[1] + options.value.Capacity;                        break;                    case 'finalize':                        if(Number(options.totalValue[1]) > 0)                            options.totalValue = (options.totalValue[0] / options.totalValue[1]);                        else                            options.totalValue = 0;                            break;                }            }            if (options.name === 'BillableVsForecastVsCapacitySummary') {                switch(options.summaryProcess) {                    case 'start':                        options.totalValue = [0,0,0];                        break;                    case 'calculate':                        options.totalValue[0] = options.totalValue[0] + options.value.BillableTime;                        options.totalValue[1] = options.totalValue[1] + options.value.ForecastTime;                        options.totalValue[2] = options.totalValue[2] + options.value.Capacity;                        break;                    case 'finalize':                        if(Number(options.totalValue[2]) > 0)                            options.totalValue = ((options.totalValue[0] + options.totalValue[1]) / options.totalValue[2]);                        else                            options.totalValue = 0;                            break;                }            }            if (options.name === 'BillableVsForecastVsContractedSummary') {                switch(options.summaryProcess) {                    case 'start':                        options.totalValue = [0,0,0];                        break;                    case 'calculate':                        options.totalValue[0] = options.totalValue[0] + options.value.BillableTime;                        options.totalValue[1] = options.totalValue[1] + options.value.ForecastTime;                        options.totalValue[2] = options.totalValue[2] + options.value.ContractedTime;                        break;                    case 'finalize':                        if(Number(options.totalValue[2]) > 0)                            options.totalValue = ((options.totalValue[0] + options.totalValue[1]) / options.totalValue[2]);                        else                            options.totalValue = 0;                            break;                }            }        }","totalItems":[{"column":"Typology Group","summaryType":"count","valueFormat":"#,##0","displayFormat":"Total: {0}","alignment":"left"},{"column":"Capacity","name":"Capacity","summaryType":"sum","valueFormat":"#,##0","displayFormat":"{0}","alignment":"right"},{"column":"Non Billable","name":"Non DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Utilization per User
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Billable and Non-Billable Actual Hours in % of User Capacity","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":300,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":false,"metricName":"# Forecast","metricFieldValue":"TimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":false,"metricName":"# Actual","metricFieldValue":"UtilizationPercentGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"SELECT
		v.UserTypologyGroup,
		v.UserType,
		v.FullName,
		v.UserId,
		v.HasImage as HasImage,
		v.[Hours],
		v.AdministrativeHours,
		v.InternalWorkHours,
        v.NewBusinessHours,
        v.BillableHours,
		v.ClientHours,
		v.NonWorkedHours,
		v.Capacity,
		v.Leaves,
		v.ContractedTime,
		v.ForecastTime,
        (v.BillableHours + v.ForecastTime) as BillableAndForecastTime,
        IIF(v.Capacity > 0, (v.ContractedTime / v.Capacity), 0) AS CapacityContractedTimeVariation,
        IIF(v.Capacity > 0, ((v.BillableHours + v.ForecastTime) / v.Capacity), 0) CapacityBillableAndForecastVariation,
        IIF(v.ContractedTime > 0, ((v.BillableHours + v.ForecastTime) / v.ContractedTime), 0) ContractedBillableAndForecastVariation,
		IIF(v.Capacity > 0, ISNULL(v.BillableHours, 0.0) / v.Capacity, 1.0) as UtilizationPercentage,
		IIF(v.Capacity > 0, ISNULL(v.NewBusinessHours, 0.0) / v.Capacity, 1.0) as UtilizationNonBillablePercentage
from 
(
	select 
			v.UserTypologyGroup,
			du.UserType,
			du.FullName,
			v.UserId,
			du.HasImage as HasImage,
			sum(v.[Hours]) as [Hours],
			sum(v.AdministrativeTime) as AdministrativeHours,
			sum(v.InternalWorkHours) as InternalWorkHours,
            sum(v.NewBusinessHours) + sum(v.AdministrativeTime) as NewBusinessHours,
		    sum(v.BillableHours) - sum(v.AdministrativeTime) as BillableHours,
			--sum(v.NewBusinessHours) as NewBusinessHours,
			--sum(v.BillableHours) as BillableHours,
			sum(v.ClientHours) as ClientHours,
			sum(v.NonWorkedHours) as NonWorkedHours,
			sum(v.Capacity) as Capacity,
			sum(v.LeaveTime) as Leaves,
			sum(v.ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
			sum(v.ForecastTime) as ForecastTime
	from (
		select 
				du.UserTypologyGroup, 
				du.Oid as UserId,
				sum(du.ActualTime) as [Hours],
				sum(du.AdministrativeTime) as AdministrativeTime,
				0 as InternalWorkHours,
				sum(du.NewBusinessTime) as NewBusinessHours,
				sum(du.BillableTime) as BillableHours,
				0 as ClientHours,
				SUM(ISNULL(du.ActualTime - (du.AdministrativeTime + du.NewBusinessTime + du.BillableTime), 0.0)) as NonWorkedHours,
				sum(du.Capacity) as Capacity,
				sum(du.LeaveTime) as LeaveTime,
				0 as ContractedTime,
				0 as ForecastTime
		from 
				Analytics.[User](@CurrentUserId) du
		where 
				(du.EndDate is null or du.EndDate > @ToDate) and
				du.[Date] between @FromDate AND DATEADD(dd, -1, @ToDate) and
                DATEPART(DW, du.[Date]) in (2,3,4,5,6) and
				(@CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR du.CompanyId = @CompanyOid) AND 
				(du.UserTypologyGroupId = @TypologyGroupOid)
		group by 
					du.Department, 
					du.UserTypologyGroup, 
					du.FullName,
					du.Oid
		union
		select 
				dt.UserTypologyGroup, 
				dt.UserId,
				0 as [Hours],
				0 as AdministrativeTime,
				SUM(ISNULL(dt.InternalWorkTime, 0.0)) AS [InternalWorkHours],
				0 as NewBusinessHours,
				0 as BillableHours,
				SUM(ISNULL(dt.BillableTime, 0.0) - ISNULL(dt.[InternalWorkTime], 0.0)) as [ClientHours],
				0 as NonWorkedHours,
				0 as Capacity,
				0 as LeaveTime,
				0 as ContractedTime,
				0 as ForecastTime
		from 
				Analytics.Timesheet(@CurrentUserId) dt
		where 
				dt.[Date] between @FromDate AND DATEADD(dd, -1, @ToDate) and
				(@CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR dt.CompanyId = @CompanyOid) AND 
				(dt.UserTypologyGroupId = @TypologyGroupOid)
		group by 
				dt.Department, 
				dt.UserTypologyGroup, 
				dt.[User],
				dt.UserId
		union
		select 
				de.UserTypologyGroup, 
				de.UserId,
				0 as [Hours],
				0 as AdministrativeTime,
				0 AS [InternalWorkHours],
				0 as NewBusinessHours,
				0 as BillableHours,
				0 as [ClientHours],
				0 as NonWorkedHours,
				0 as Capacity,
				0 as LeaveTime,
				sum(de.[Hours]) as ContractedTime,
				0 as ForecastTime
		from 
				Analytics.Estimate(@CurrentUserId) de
		where 
				de.[Date] between @FromDate AND DATEADD(dd, -1, @ToDate) and
				(@CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR de.CompanyId = @CompanyOid) AND 
				(de.UserTypologyGroupId = @TypologyGroupOid)
		group by 
				de.UserTypologyGroup, 
				de.[User],
				de.UserId
		union
		select 
				ph.UserTypologyGroup,
				ph.UserId as UserId,
				0 as [Hours],
				0 as AdministrativeTime,
				0 AS [InternalWorkHours],
				0 as NewBusinessHours,
				0 as BillableHours,
				0 as [ClientHours],
				0 as NonWorkedHours,
				0 as Capacity,
				0 as LeaveTime,
				0 as ContractedTime,
				sum(ph.[Hours]) as ForecastTime
		from 
				Analytics.PlannedHours(@CurrentUserId) ph,
				Analytics.Project(@CurrentUserId) dp
		where 
				ph.ProjectId = dp.Oid and
				dp.[Date] between @FromDate AND DATEADD(dd, -1, @ToDate) and
				(@CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR ph.CompanyId = @CompanyOid) AND 
				(ph.UserTypologyGroupId = @TypologyGroupOid)
		group by 
				ph.UserTypologyGroup,
				ph.[User],
				ph.UserId
	) v 
left outer join (select distinct du.FullName, du.HasImage, du.IsActive, du.UserType, du.UserTypeId, du.Oid from Analytics.[User](@CurrentUserId) du)du on du.Oid = v.UserId
where (du.UserTypeId = @UserType or @UserType = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') 
group by 
		v.UserTypologyGroup,
		du.UserType,
		du.FullName,
		du.HasImage,
		v.UserId
) v"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate","companyOid","divisionOid","departmentOid","TypologyGroupOid","UserType"]}}]
